description: The original Terminator movie (1984) had a relatively low budget of around $6.4 million but went on to gross over $78 million worldwide.

title: Predátor
description: Sylvester Stallone was originally offered the role of Dutch, but he turned it down. The role eventually went to Arnold Schwarzenegger, marking one of the biggest action star face-offs in film history.

title: Comando
description: Commando is known for its outrageous action sequences and high body count. Schwarzenegger’s character kills over 70 people in the movie, which was considered excessive at the time but became a hallmark of '80s action films.

title: Conan
description: A significant portion of the movie was filmed in the deserts of Spain. The filmmakers used the harsh, desolate landscapes to create the film’s gritty, ancient world, making it visually striking and helping to establish the tone of Conan’s barbaric world.
